audioText: Quand j'aurai terminé ce projet, je laisserai tomber mon travail actuel pour me consacrer entièrement à l'entrepreneuriat social. Cette décision représente un tournant majeur dans ma carrière professionnelle.
question: What does the speaker plan to do after finishing their current project?
options: Continue working on similar projects while pursuing social entrepreneurship as a side interest
Quit their current job completely to focus entirely on social entrepreneurship
Negotiate with their employer to gradually reduce their workload
Start a new company while keeping their current professional role
explanation: The speaker says 'je laisserai tomber mon travail actuel pour me consacrer entièrement à l'entrepreneuriat social' - I will quit my current job to focus entirely on social entrepreneurship. This represents a major career change.
